attributes.action: The Queen to close Parliament and call a General election
attributes.additional_details: Parliamentarians will not call a General Election as they know the public will displace them. So we call on Parliament to inform Her Majesty Queen Elizabeth ll that Her people look at her to close Parliament and call a General Election due to the incompetence of her Westminster MPs to the Referendum on Europe in 2016 and the Btexit negotiations within the EU and the British parliament
attributes.background: As the sitting MPs of Parliament have ignored the will of the 2016 referendum. The people of the United Kingdom and Northern Ireland demand a general election in order to restore democracy to Her Majesty's Kingdom.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it's not clear what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take.

Under the Fixed Terms Parliament Act 2011 the Queen cannot dissolve Parliament. 

You might like to sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/235480
